channel.title: Blackmarks
channel.description: Ever since I have started my server people have been misbehaving and didn't deserve a mute or ban, and it is very hard to keep up with who and who didn't receive warnings. So i thought it would be nice to have commands such as ::warn (number of black marks to add) or ::unwarn (number of blackmarks to remove) ::viewbm (view number of black marks you have) found in other earlier 307 sources. I am just wondering if there is a nice chunk of code i could Implement into making such a system In-game for a 508 source or if there is no such code or the code is no longer open source, if there is a way i could use an smf modification and customize it to serve the same purpose.

item.title: Blackmarks
item.dc:creator: @andrew4444 andrew4444
item.description:
@andrew4444 wrote:

We read our tutorials and understand every single thing they say. But have no way of knowing how to integrate it in our games. In other words since your comprehension level is so low, we have no way of changing “Java” to “English” to “Game”. Calling me a twat is just like me asking you to code java in Spanish. It takes a twat to know one, not that you know me as one or anything, I’m sure you use that trait in yourself to find other twats. Back on topic people, how can this be achieved. Respond in “English” as listed above and post some decent tutorial or something. Since you are such a Java master why not post something Treber.

Read full topic

item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

why not just pm the person “you are on orange zone, you will get a mute/ban if you brake another rule”.

red zone = ipban/mute/ban.

green zone = none…

seriously, it wud be quite hard to code what you have just said.

item.title: Blackmarks
item.dc:creator: @andrew4444 andrew4444
item.description:
@andrew4444 wrote:

Let me “clarify” the requirements of such a system. A command to add and remove a specified number of black marks is required, a panel in which the player can view offenses/zone in text format. A certain number of black marks should put the player into the green/yellow/orange/red zones and automatically mute/ban them based on the black marks they have. Also there should be images to show they are in that zone. An option to send an appeal for each listed offense should be there.

Read full topic

item.title: Blackmarks
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

andrew4444:

I still do want a warning system of some kind so things would be considered “fair” by the players.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 26, 2009, 10:02:07 am[/size][hr]!Joshua it’s more complicated then that, I’m going to need more than just one variable.

Jesus, do you retards never read?

!Joshua:

This is very very simple, you just create a variable and use that variable for the amount of blackmarks they have, and make thet variable save/load from a text file.
